product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Lite Presta Tube - 26 x 1.7 - 2.12
long_description: This self-sealing Lite Presta tube comes pre-gooped with SLIME tire sealant, which repeatedly seals punctures up to 1/8". The high-tech, environmentally responsible formula inside the tube keeps working where the thorn-resistant tube stops. SLIME is environmentally safe, non-aerosol, non-toxic and non-hazardous. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This self-sealing Lite Presta tube comes pre-gooped with SLIME tire sealant, which repeatedly seals punctures up to 1/8".
